message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV

This paper deals with representation learning and option discovery in reinforcement learning, which are topics that are commonly studied in the machine learning community. The paper proposes a new approach for option discovery based on eigenpurposes, which are intrinsic reward functions derived from learned representations. This approach is applicable to a wide range of RL problems, including traditional tabular domains and Atari 2600 games. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
